sub_title: Go-to-Market | Strategic B2B Sales Executive | ABM & Growth | Tech
summary:
My purpose is to help companies drive digital transformation and shape a sustainable future by putting technology to work for them in powerful ways that positively impact their business.

I'm a B2B sales-driven professional with experience in the international environment and a proven track record as a top performer that consistently exceeds targets and quotas. Throughout my career, I have had the privilege of working with both Scaleups and Enterprises, gaining invaluable insights into various markets. Having lived in countries such as Brazil, the United States, Chile, The Netherlands, and Hungary, I possess a deep understanding of diverse cultures and business practices. 

Passionate about forging meaningful connections, I have successfully engaged with clients and partners across the globe – NAM, EMEA, LATAM and APAC -, establishing strong communication skills and an extensive knowledge of global markets, sales strategies, demand generation, ABM and go-to-market strategies.  

Yes, I love to be a salesperson. I'm constantly seeking ways to help clients solve real problems using innovative solutions. I relish the opportunity to connect with C-level executives, learning from their experiences and collaborating to enhance their businesses. A natural problem-solver, my inquisitive nature prompts me to always ask "why" and fuels my creativity, ensuring that I consistently bring fresh ideas to the table and ideate on process improvement plans. 

📧 Feel free to contact me if you want to talk about sales, digital transformation, account-based growth or anything you consider valuable!
giovanna.franco@infinityn.com
+44 1223 790989

profile_positions.description:
Driving global B2B enterprise & startup growth through account-based agile methods and buyer-centric strategies, while establishing and developing processes, strategies, and business growth initiatives.  

I'm working with C-level in the Marketing and Sales space to drive their go-to-market transformation and help them with pipeline and demand gen projects. 

► SUCCESS HIGHLIGHTS: 

• Team generated $5M qualified pipeline in Q2 2023.  
• Team Achieved qualified opportunities with net new logos within two weeks.  
• Restructured ICP definition and Target Account List.  
• Optimized ABM and social media campaign with personalized content. 
 
► MAIN ACTIVITIES 

• Account Executive responsible to present high level, technical services to diverse audiences & leadership and close deals.  
• Identified new sales opportunities and cultivate long-term partnerships.  
• Generated reports on pipeline and revenue generation.  

• Built, coached, and scaled a Growth SDR team to generate qualified pipeline with C-level prospects in Scaleup and Enterprise companies across NAM and EMEA.  
• Set weekly and monthly targets and KPIs 
• Approve SQLs from SDRs, ensuring alignment with ICP, buyer persona, and qualification criteria (BANT and MEDDPIC).  
• Created onboarding and development sales training to enhance SDRs' mastery of products and outbound sales engagement.  
• Created sales playbook, prospecting cadences, and impactful pitches.  
• Conduct market analysis and review intent data and ABM campaign to drive exponential growth in the sales pipeline.  

• Collaborate with cross-functional departments, leveraging data-driven insights to support Infinityn's overall business growth. 
• Collaborate with the IT operations to automate and improve sales and marketing CRM processes, including the creation of account journey stages, reports, and dashboards. 

Technologies: Demandbase, 6sense, Folloze, InsideView, Zoominfo, LI Sales Navigator, Hubspot, Salesforce, RevenueGrid and Tableu.
profile_positions.title: Growth Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Led a high-performing team of outsourced BDRs, driving new business growth for Clarivate Strategic Accounts in NAM and EMEA, focusing on Life Sciences, Academia, Professional Services, Consumer Manufacturing industries. 

► SUCCESS HIGHLIGHTS: 

• Generated $3M pipeline in 6 months.  
• Team Achieved 110% of quota for Q3 FY22.  
• Successfully launched a new campaign, introducing a vertical and achieving 193% quota attainment within one month. 

► MAIN ACTIVITIES - CLIENT MANAGEMENT: 

• Prepared comprehensive Sales and Activity Reports on ROI 
• Log and manage opportunities in client's CRM  
• Conduct cadence calls to review and report on generated opportunities and support their development  
• Developed an in-depth understanding of client value propositions, USPs, products, and services.  
• Familiarized myself with clients' internal technology stack to better serve their needs.  
• Actively gathered information and feedback from the client to ensure alignment and satisfaction. 

► MAIN ACTIVITIES - SDR TEAM MANAGEMENT: 

• Reporting to Head of Client Success Management 
• Mastered Clarivate's Command of the Message, empowering sales teams to effectively engage C-Level executives.  
• Prospected and conducted qualification calls with key accounts to test the market and support pipeline qualification efforts.  
• Created and implemented tailored solutions and selling skills training, covering account research processes, buyer personas, personalized messaging, pitches, and pipeline management.  
• Coached the team on client product knowledge, sales cadence, GDPR, and Data Protection.  
• Effectively delegated tasks, set targets, and ensured deadlines were met.  
• Conducted regular 1-1 meetings and quarterly performance evaluations to provide guidance and assess progress.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Client Success & SDR Manager

profile_positions.description:
Interim SDR to AVEVA. Powering people with technology that improves industrial efficiency, safety, and reliability.   

Outbound prospecting across NAM and EMEA regions, targeting key decision-makers in the Manufacturing, Energy, Oil & Gas, Chemical, Food & Beverage, and Utilities sectors to effectively identify, qualify, and nurture a robust sales pipeline.  

► SUCCESS HIGHLIGHTS  

• Responsible for over $12.3M in pipeline-over a 1.5 yr   
• Top performer FY21 & FY22 with 255% quota attainment    
• Built a pipeline with 200+ qualified leads with net new logo and existing customers    
• Quickly learned and ramped; Achieved 143% quota attainment in the first month prospecting    
• 1rst APM close/won sales after 6 months in a 1-year sales cycle  
• Peak Performance & Beast Mode Award     

► MAIN ACTIVITIES  
• Conduct discovery and introductory calls with C-level prospects, utilizing the BANT and MEDDPIC qualification framework to recommend AVEVA solutions to meet customers’ business goals  
• Leveraged sales engagement tools (e.g., LI Sales Navigator, Salesforce, HubSpot, RevenueGrid, Demandbase and Zoominfo) for research and targeted outreach 
• Proficiently logged and managed pipeline using CRM platforms 
• Provided training on email personalization, social selling techniques, and effective pitching. 
• North America SDR team lead, managing 8 SDRs. Provided coaching on outbound prospecting and qualification and Target Accounts allocation 
• Logged and managed prospecting and pipeline activity using CRM platforms to ensure accurate and up-to-date information for effective sales management 
•  Work closely with Account Managers and Sales Leaders to build and execute plans to accelerate sales opportunities, ensuring that all activities are closely aligned to AVEVA priorities and selling motions

profile_positions.title: Strategic Global Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Specializing in sales and procurement of industrial materials (MRO - Maintenance, Repair, Operations) and machinery for the Oil & Gas, Energy, Food & Beverage, and Metals & Mining industries. 

► SUCCESS HIGHLIGHTS: 

• A proven track record of delivering sales growth; 172% quota attainment in FY20.  
• Developed and managed a key client, positioning them among the TOP 3 Key Accounts company-wide.  
• Collaborated with the logistics team to streamline the purchasing and delivery process, resulting in reduced delivery time and improved customer communication. 

► MAIN ACTIVITIES: 

• Oversee the entire sales cycle, including account planning, sales forecasting, order management, and contract negotiation.  
• Cultivate strong relationships with key accounts, understanding their needs and proposing solutions aligned with their objectives.  
• Quote materials from global suppliers (USA, Germany, and China), prepare proposals, and submit quotes to customers' SAP ERP system under tight deadlines  
• Negotiate price, delivery time, and payment terms with global suppliers to ensure optimal return on investment.  
• Create and negotiate annual contracts, defining payment terms, incoterms, delivery schedules, and prices. 
• Manage quotation creation, purchase orders, and order management using Salesforce CRM.  

• Promoted by leadership in < 4 months to oversee Key Accounts Sales consultant's team lead: developing action plans to enhance internal processes, ensure timely delivery of offers, nurture customer relationships, and achieve monthly sales targets.  

• Member of the culture team, conducting interviews to identify potential candidates who align with the company's values, providing training, and organizing events to instill and reinforce company values.
profile_positions.title: International Key Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Driving Solupart's growth by expanding our footprint with new and existing accounts and ensuring client retention. 

► SUCCESS HIGHLIGHTS: 

• Successfully reengaged and revitalized an old client, establishing advisor trust through consistent cadence calls and providing support in optimizing their maintenance processes. This resulted in a remarkable 10x increase in their purchasing activity and the development of the account into a key account portfolio. 

► MAIN DELIVERIES: 

• Take ownership of the entire sales cycle, building strong relationships with new customers and reestablishing connections with previous clients.  
• Manage requests for quotations (RFQs) and purchase orders, ensuring timely submission of bids and order fulfillment.  
• Generate competitive proposals and skillfully negotiate contracts to secure deals that align with both customer needs and Solupart's objectives.  
• Provide end-to-end support in global mobility processes, facilitating smooth logistics and seamless transactions for international clients.  
• Collaborate closely with internal teams to streamline operations and deliver exceptional customer service. 
• Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities, leveraging this knowledge to identify opportunities for business growth and adapt sales strategies accordingly.
